channel.title: [PI] 317 Adding Crowns to right click menu
channel.description:
Hi people, so i want to add a crown to the right click menu for staff and i'm a little stuck but i have half of it done (i think) my code so far (i have loyalty titles):
[code]s = modIcons[2] + "@" + rightClickColor(player.skill) + "@" + getRank(player.skill) + "@whi@" + player.name + combatDiffColor(myPlayer.combatLevel, player.combatLevel) + " (level-" + player.combatLevel + ")";[/code]
and it comes out like this... [img]http://i.imgur.com/lroJmgn.png[/img]
I'm pretty sure the part i'm missing is the .drawSprite and maybe something else... If anyone can help out, that would be great

item.title: [PI] 317 Adding Crowns to right click menu
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

As far as I know, the menu area (the right click menu) doesn’t actually have support for crowns/sprites.

<img=0> doesn’t work (This is the 498 look-alike way of drawing sprites)
@cr0@ doesn’t work (the old way to draw sprites)
and modIcons[0].drawSprite(0, 0); doesn’t return a string so you can’t use it in a string. (like what you’re attempting to do).

I’m sure if you wanted you could add the support for it, but I don’t know.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] 317 Adding Crowns to right click menu
